% !! Comment out the following line for a development build (or)               !! %
% !! Uncomment the following line for a camera ready build                     !! %

% \def\isinternal{0}\def\isextended{1}\def\isauthorid{1}

% !! Do not touch any file that is named `<thing>_AUTOGEN.tex`                 !! %
% !! These files are automatically generated from `tex_autogen/<thing>.tex`    !! %
% !! To regenerate them:                                                       !! %
% !!   1. Download the project to a computer that has Make and LaTeX installed !! %
% !!   2. Run `make` from the command line at the root of the project          !! %
% !!   3. Upload the new generated files to Overleaf                           !! %
% !! Note: (1) and (3) are easy to automate with Overleaf's git integration    !! %
% !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! %

%%%%%%%%%
% FLAGS %
%%%%%%%%%

% 1. Is this an internal version? (i.e., not public-facing.)
% 2. Is this an extended version? (e.g., includes appendix.)
% 3. Should authors be identified? (e.g., not submitted for blind peer review.)

\ifdefined \isinternal \else \def \isinternal{1} \fi
\ifdefined \isextended \else \def \isextended{1} \fi
\ifdefined \isauthorid \else \def \isauthorid{1} \fi

% Defaults can be overridden from the Makefile
\newif \ifinternal \if \isinternal 0 \internalfalse \else \internaltrue \fi
\newif \ifextended \if \isextended 0 \extendedfalse \else \extendedtrue \fi
\newif \ifauthorid \if \isauthorid 0 \authoridfalse \else \authoridtrue \fi

%%%%%%%%%%%%
% DOCUMENT %
%%%%%%%%%%%%

\documentclass[12pt]{article}

%%%%%%%%%
% SETUP %
%%%%%%%%%

% \def\isemulateword{1} % used by `darais/defaults.tex` and `darais/imports.tex`

\input{darais/imports}
\input{darais/macros}
\input{local/imports}
\input{local/macros}

% \usepackage{showframe}

% \chead{...}
% \rhead{...}
% \lfoot{...}
% \cfoot{...}
% \rfoot{...}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%

%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\begin{document}

\input{local/defaults}

\endinput
